articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from KFA Chairman
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from KFA Chairman
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), received a message of greeting from Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, on November 16. 
					 In the message the chairman reminded Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un that the Korean Friendship Association (KFA) convened this year an international meeting on the theme "The honor of holding our great leader Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army." 
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il developed the KPA into the most powerful matchless army in history, the message continued: 
					
					 Endowed with inborn outstanding military wisdom, Kim Jong Il clarified that arms alone can protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country and steadfastly pursued the Songun politics even in the most difficult period. 
					
					 Delegates from different parts of the world are recollecting with deep emotion the glorious careers of President Kim Il Sung and Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and the great exploits performed by them and Your Excellency successfully carrying forward the cause of socialist construction at the "speed on Masik Pass". 
					
					 The world is looking up to the homeland of Juche as a bulwark of the red flag, hope of the oppressed people and a guardian of moral and noble mankind. 
					
					 The KFA will dynamically launch the work for defending your country from the smear campaign of the Western media and the moves and plots of the imperialists and realize more brisk exchanges in culture, diplomacy, sports, science and economy. 
					
					 The message expressed conviction that the DPRK under the leadership of Kim Jong Un would emerge a powerful and united country having close friends in many cities and villages of the world. 
					
					 It most sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and victory. 
					
					 The message said: The great leader President Kim Il Sung and Generalissimo Kim Jong Il will always be with us. 
					
					 Long live our Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un!

articles.title: U.S. Slammed for Blocking Resumption of Six-Party Talks with Unreasonable Preconditions: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman
articles.content:
U.S. Slammed for Blocking Resumption of Six-Party Talks with Unreasonable Preconditions: Spokesman
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Tuesday in connection with the fact that the special representative for north Korea policy of the U.S. State Department toured countries around the DPRK:
					 What the special representative said and did while touring countries around the DPRK proved that the U.S. remains unchanged in its attitude set to check the resumption of the six-party talks while persisting in absurd preconditions.
					
					 This clearly proved once again that the U.S. has had no interest in the resumption of the six-party talks from the beginning.
					
					 The six-party talks aim at removing the root cause of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula and denuclearizing the whole of the peninsula in the spirit of respect for sovereignty and equality.
					
					 But the U.S. has not fulfilled the commitments it made at the six- party talks in the past and now rejects the talks by raising the brigandish demand for the DPRK's unilateral concession first.
					
					 It is also resorting to a trick to shift the blame for the stalled six- party talks on to the DPRK in a bid to evade increasing denunciation and pressure from the public inside and outside.
					
					 But with no sleight of hand can it evade its responsibilities for the nuclear issue on the peninsula. It also has to withdraw its hostile policy toward the DPRK and create an atmosphere for denuclearization of the peninsula.
					
					 We want a negotiated settlement of the issue but will never accede to unreasonable preconditions raised by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. improper behavior of deliberately creating obstacles in the way of resuming the talks under absurd preconditions will always be blamed and the U.S. will have to own full responsibilities for ensuing consequences.
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its goal for the denuclearization of the whole of the Korean Peninsula but it will be compelled to steadily bolster deterrence as long as the U.S. becomes all the more undisguised in pursuing hostile moves and increasing nuclear threats.

articles.title: Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Swaziland
articles.content:
Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Swaziland
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Monday sent a congratulatory message to Mgwagwa Gamedze upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Swaziland.
					 The message wished him success in his new job, expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop.

articles.title: DPRK Telecom Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Telecom Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications headed by Minister Sim Chol Ho came back home on Tuesday after participating in the Asia-Pacific Summit and the 2013 World Telecom Exhibition held in Bangkok.

articles.title: Photo of Kim Il Sung Meeting with Ho Chi Minh Displayed at Kyongsang Kindergarten
articles.content:
National Meeting for Supporting Korea's Reunification Held in Japan
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The 31st national meeting of the movement for supporting Korea's reunification took place in Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan on November 17.
					 Present there were Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, members of the committee, members of the executive committee of the national meeting and representatives from the friendship organizations in different parts of Japan.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and other officials of Chongryon.
					
					 Introduced there were messages from the Korean Society for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, the British Friendship Society with Korea and the Philippines Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Kenji Mizutani, secretary general of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, in his keynote address denounced the Japanese government for its evermore undisguised discrimination and suppression of the Koreans in Japan and called on the Japanese people to make a tangible contribution to the peaceful reunification of Korea and the normalization of diplomatic relations between Japan and the DPRK.
					
					 Then followed a lecture on the subject "For the conclusion of peace agreement and normalization of diplomatic relations between Japan and the DPRK." Speakers laid bare the hostile acts of Japan and the south Korean regime against the DPRK and the Seoul authorities' unreasonable campaign to stifle a progressive political party and stressed the need to improve the north-south relations and the relations between Japan and the DPRK.
					
					 The meeting denounced the south Korean authorities for their fascist action against the progressive forces and adopted an appeal demanding the U.S. replace the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty and Japan lift the sanctions against the DPRK.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK has recently issued stamps (four sheetlets) showing some of the historical sites and remains in Kaesong City, registered as world's cultural heritages according to a decision of the 37th meeting of the UNESCO World Heritage Committee in June.
					 Those relics are Taesong Hall at the Koryo Songgyungwan Academy, the highest educational institution in the period of Koryo Kingdom (918-1392), Nam Gate in Kaesong built in 1391-1393, Mausoleum of Kongmin, the 31st king of Koryo, and his wife and Sonjuk Bridge.
					
					 Kaesong was the capital city of Koryo, the first unified state in Korea. Preserved there are 90-odd historical sites and remains.
					
					 Meanwhile, the bureau brought out three kinds of individual stamps dealing with fossils discovered in the country, including the Tuman River fossil fish.

articles.title: Trees Planted at Arboretum of Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Trees Planted at Arboretum of Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and agricultural workers from across the country planted trees at the arboretum of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday.
					 Officials of the Central Committee of the Union, officials of the union in cities (districts) and counties of Pyongyang, North and South Phyongan, North and South Hwanghae provinces brought there  more than 8 000 trees and saplings of 19 species, 32 500 flower roots of 8 species including peony and flower seeds. Among them were officials of the primary organizations of the union at the Sahyon Cooperative Farm, Pyoksong County who brought with them good species of trees and flower roots and farmers of the Wonhung Farm in Anju City and the Obong Cooperative Farm in Nyongbyon County who brought with them gingko trees and Changsong larch tree saplings they raised in their courtyards.
					
					 They planted trees with sincere desire to contribute to sprucing up the area around the palace, the sacred temple of Juche where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Remaining True to Idea of "By Our Nation Itself"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Remaining True to Idea of "By Our Nation Itself"
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The basic principle that the north and the south of Korea should observe and implement for achieving national reunification is the three principles of national reunification -- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity -- and the idea "By our nation itself", says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 The idea "By our nation itself" that is the essence of the June 15 joint declaration, a great programme for reunification common to the Korean nation in the 21st century, and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, reflects the desire and wishes of all Koreans for independent and peaceful reunification and gives the most scientific answers to the complicated theoretical and practical issues arising in accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 A nation should handle its own affairs in conformity with its will and wishes. No one can take issue with this practice.
					
					 The above-said idea clarified by the north-south joint declarations is the idea of national independence from A to Z.
					
					 Its great vitality has been clearly proved in the practical struggle in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 If the inter-Korean relations are to be put on a normal orbit on the basis of the idea of "By our nation itself" and the independent reunification of the country is to be achieved, it is necessary to decisively eliminate the sycophants and traitors who stake their fate on dependence on foreign forces.
					
					 The confrontation between the north and the south of Korea is bound to spark off a war and it is only foreign aggressors who fish in troubled waters.
					
					 The adherence to the above-said idea is a specially important requirement for averting the danger of a war and achieving the peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 Great national unity precisely means national reunification and it represents patriotism.
					
					 The south Korean ruling forces are sadly mistaken if they think they can get something by sticking to the "theory of adhering to the principle," a theory of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The traitorous forces insisting on this theory while challenging the principle of reunification common to the nation are bound to meet destruction in face of the dynamic struggle of all Koreans to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Science and Technology Are Mainstay for State Development: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Science and Technology Are Mainstay for State Development: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Science and technology are the mainstay for state development, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The country's political, ideological and military might can be fully displayed only when it is backed by the latest science and technology.
					
					 Science and technology are the foundation of the national power and serve as a driving force for achieving national prosperity.
					
					 To rapidly develop science and technology serves as a basic guarantee for putting all fields of the country on a high scientific basis to suit the appearance of a thriving nation.
					
					 To rapidly develop science and technology is an important requirement for always taking the initiative in the confrontation with imperialism and winning a victory only.
					
					 The imperialists are increasing political pressure and escalating military blackmail and psychological warfare to isolate and stifle the DPRK, while enforcing the policies of scientific and technological blockade and sanctions. 
					
					 The rapid development of science and technology serves as a driving force for bringing about a decisive turn in building an economic power and improving the people's living standard through an intensified drive for creating the "speed on Masik Pass".
					
					 To develop science and technology provides the best method of making creations and bringing about innovations and the key to effecting leap forward. This is clearly proved by the experience gained by service personnel of the Korean People's Army in creating the speed of construction startling the world under the slogan of the "speed on Masik Pass".
					
					 There is no future without science and there can be no prosperity of the country and the nation without developing science and technology.

articles.title: Stop to S. Korean Regime's Crackdown on Teachers Union Demanded
articles.content:
Stop to S. Korean Regime's Crackdown on Teachers Union Demanded
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Federation of World Teachers Organizations held a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 18 at which it demanded the south Korean regime stop its crackdown upon the Teachers Union (Jongyojo).
					 A speaker at the conference said he could not repress concern over such act of the south Korean regime as breaking the promise made with the international community as evidenced by its action taken to label Jongyojo "outlawed union" for the mere reason that it refuses to revise the rules of the organization recognizing the dismissed workers as unionists. 
					
					 He held that freedom of expression and right to solidarity should be guaranteed, adding that the quality of education can be improved only when teachers are allowed to freely express their will. 
					
					 If the south Korean regime does not stop the crackdown upon Jongyojo, it will not be able to participate in any international meeting on education, he warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Agitating Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Agitating Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on Nov. 18 carried an article accusing the puppet chief executive of agitating the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					 The article recalled that Park Geun Hye in her "policy speech" let loose a spate of expressions reminiscent of the period under the rule of Park Chung-Hee.
					
					 She used in her "policy speech" the expression of "miracles in the River Han" which she repeated four times in her "inaugural speech" in a bid to spark off yearning for Park Chung-Hee among the conservative circles, it said.
					
					 There are increasing voices criticizing Park Geun Hye as "shadow of Park Chung-Hee", it stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign Slammed
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet group co-sponsored a "resolution on human rights in north Korea", a conspiratorial one against the DPRK, at the UN together with foreign forces and took the lead in the farce for cooking it up. When the resolution was rammed through, the group "welcomed" it and cried out for railroading "the bill on human rights in the north" through the "National Assembly".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is a grave challenge to the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and a cynical ploy to intensify an international campaign to stifle it.
					
					 The anti-DPRK human rights racket kicked off by the puppet group in league with the U.S. is a ridiculous artifice to conceal the truth about south Korea which turned into a colony of the U.S. and the worst tundra of democracy and human rights, tide over the ruling crisis caused by its unpopular rule and divert elsewhere the people's criticism of it.
					
					 The group had better reflect on the crimes it has committed by reviving the "yusin" dictatorship and ruthlessly trampling down democracy and human rights before impudently taking issue with others.
					
					 The group's above-said racket will only lead to stoking distrust and escalating confrontation between the north and the south and sparking off a war as it is part of the unpardonable criminal scenario to do harm to the social system in the DPRK and realize the ambition for achieving "the unification of the social systems" from A to Z. Such racket is provocative as joint military exercises against the DPRK.
					
					 This racket is pushing the seriously bedeviled inter-Korean relations to the brink of a war. Herein lies its gravity.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Forces' Illegal Interference in Election under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Forces' Illegal Interference in Election under Fire
Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The Jonju Parish Priests Group of the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice held a mass on the situation in Kunsan, North Jolla Province on Nov. 22 in protest against the puppet ruling forces' illegal interference in the election.
					Speakers said the regime bereft of validity does not serve the people but encroaches upon their human rights and builds a repressive society.
					
					They demanded the arrest of Lee Myung Bak who let power organs wantonly interfere in the election.
					
					A statement was read out at the mass.
					
					It accused the chief executive of passing the buck for the interference in the election to others, pretending that she had nothing to do with the election rigging, though she is directly and wholly to blame for it, and refusing to make any probe into the truth or make apology. The election held in an illegal and fraudulent manner with power organs involved can be seen only in dictatorial society, it held.
					
					It urged the chief executive to apologize and step down as she is chiefly to blame for the election rigging.
					
					At the end of the mass the participants staged a demonstration, holding slogans "President, step down" and "We denounce illegal election and the president, step down".
					
					Then the participants held a candlelight rally and strongly condemned the puppet Intelligence Service and other power organs for their interference in the election.
					
					Meanwhile, a religious figure of the Jonju Parish Priests Group of the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice on Nov. 25 declared that he would carry on the campaign to force the puppet regime to step down.
					
					Last year's election was a fraudulent election held with power organs involved, he said.
					
					There are a lot of evidence proving that the results of vote-counting in the election were fabricated, he noted, adding that, after all, Park Geun Hye should step down.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces' Sycophantic Act Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces' Sycophantic Act Flailed
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces requested the special envoy of the U.S. State Department for the human rights issue in north Korea and politicians of other countries to cooperate with them over the "nuclear and human rights issues of the north".
					 Minju Joson Tuesday describes this as a despicable act of sycophantic traitors who kowtow to the foreign forces.
					
					 The south Korean regime has no face to clamor for the "north's dismantlement of nuclear weapons", the paper says, adding that the DPRK opted for possessing nuclear deterrence because the U.S. introduced huge nuclear weapons into south Korea and threatened the DPRK with them in collusion with the south Korean regime.
					
					 The news analyst continues:
					
					 The puppet regime keeps mum about the U.S., which is increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula. Instead it begged other countries to cooperate with it in its moves against the DPRK, while taking issue with the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence which reliably guarantees peace of the country and the well-being of all the Koreans. This only brings to light the true colors of the south Korean puppet forces as sycophantic traitors who find their way-out in dependence on foreign forces and escalation of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The same is the case with the rhetoric of "human rights" by the south Korean puppet forces. They turned south Korea into the veritable hell where fascist dictatorship stalks and the right to existence of the people is ruthlessly violated. It is preposterous for the south Korean regime to talk about "human rights" of someone.
					
					 By soliciting for anti-DPRK cooperation the south Korean regime seeks to force the DPRK to disarm itself with the help of foreign forces and create a pretext for interfering in internal affairs of the DPRK and thus realize its ambition for invasion of the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces resort to cooperation with foreign forces to tide over the ruling crisis caused by their unpopular rule and policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen, and to do harm to the DPRK but this will only precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: Japan's Wild Ambition for Overseas Aggression Denounced
articles.content:
Japan's Wild Ambition for Overseas Aggression Denounced
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Defense minister in a recent press conference expressed his willingness to finish the revision of Japan-U.S. defense cooperation guidelines by the end of 2014 as scheduled even though the reexamination of the constitutional interpretation which allows the exercise of the right to collective self-defense is delayed. Mentioning the reason for it, he referred to so-called threats from neighboring countries.
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday says that threats do not come from countries surrounding Japan, emphasizing that other countries are being exposed to threats from Japan, which is looking to turn the country into a military giant and realize its wild ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 After the defeat in the Second World War, Japan has worked hard to realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" with the support of the U.S. imperialists who have been hell-bent on realizing its world domination strategy, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Considering that conditions are ripe for realizing their ambition for overseas aggression the Japanese reactionaries have become undisguised in their moves to launch overseas aggression.
					
					 As it has become highly likely for the reexamination of the constitutional interpretation regarding the right to collective self-defense to be delayed in the face of strong protest by the public at home and abroad, the Japanese reactionaries are considering revising Japan-U.S. defense cooperation guidelines under the spurious signboards of "tightened Japan-U.S. alliance" and "threat to security".
					
					 They have long craved for realizing their ambition for overseas aggression. This is clearly evidenced by their moves to change even the strategy of depending on locally available resources for the production of defense hardware which they have "maintained" for the past nearly four decades.
					
					 Japan should clearly bear in mind that if it dreams of realizing its wild ambition for overseas aggression, oblivious of the lesson of history, it will only meet earlier ruin.

articles.title: Int'l Meeting Held in Germany in Praise of Songun Revolutionary Exploits of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Int'l Meeting Held in Germany in Praise of Songun Revolutionary Exploits of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- There took place an international meeting on the theme "Honor of holding our great leader Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army" in Koeln City, Germany on Nov. 16. 
					 On display in the venue of the meeting were photos showing the exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and books introducing the DPRK. 
					
					 It was attended by delegates of the Korean Friendship Association (KFA) and its branches in different countries and other personages. 
					
					 The chairman of the KFA said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was born in Mt. Paektu and grew up, experiencing severe tempests of the revolution. He was a modest great man who made tireless long journeys of Songun, having short and uncomfortable sleep and eating rice-balls as his meal. His Songun revolutionary exploits are being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un possessed of the spirit of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 The delegate of the Swiss branch of the KFA said that the Korean people could decisively frustrate the moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for war of aggression thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.  Under the steersmanship of iron-willed brilliant commander Marshal Kim Jong Un the Korean people will carry out the behests of the great Generalissimos and surely achieve the reunification of the country, he added. 
					
					 The delegates of branches of Germany, Belgium and Spain said that the DPRK fully demonstrated its might by glorifying the undying exploits of the Generalissimos and the Korean people are dynamically advancing towards the future under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The delegate of the Polish branch said the Korean People's Army developed into invincible armed forces reliably defending sovereignty, independence and security of the country and the people thanks to the immortal dedication of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The Czech committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Prague on Nov. 20. 
					 Miroslav Stepan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from Nov. 22 to Dec. 18 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events to introduce the undying revolutionary life and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated Abroad
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- There took place a remembrance meeting in Russia, work reading session in Nigeria and lecture and film show in Benin on Nov. 19 and 20 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Present at the events were personages of different social standings and masses in the relevant countries. 
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Nakhodka City Assembly of Russia said that the city assembly designated Kim Jong Il's works as must books and deeply grasped his greatness and came to have faith in the victory of Korean-style socialism by studying his works 
					
					 The acting chairman of the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies said at the reading session for Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Juche-Oriented Socialist State with Invincible Might" that it is the immovable truth that a great leader and great party build a great country and that even a small and backward country can be developed into an advanced and authoritative powerful country if its leader and party are great. 
					
					 The chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism- Kimjongilism said that Kim Jong Il's formulation of the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as an integral system of the idea, theory and method of Juche marked a noteworthy event in carrying out the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Legends about Mt. Kumgang (11)
articles.content:
Legends about Mt. Kumgang (11)
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- In Sea Kumgang, part of scenic Mt. Kumgang, there are two pillar-shaped rocks surrounded by several grotesque rocks redolent of earthworm, carp, lion, etc.
					 Called Pubu (couple) Rocks, the pillar-shaped rocks tell about a legend well known among the local people.
					
					 Once upon a time, a young couple settled down by Sea Kumgang.
					
					 They eked out their living on herbs and seafood, sharing the bitters and sweets. Though distressed by poverty, they enjoyed their life optimistically, helping each other.
					
					 In evenings, the sounds of flute and Korean lute played by them echoed through Sea Kumgang. The melodies were so enchanting that villagers gathered in the couple's straw-thatched house to enjoy them. It was told that even fairies danced to the melodies.
					
					 One day, the couple went to the sea to catch ormer but could not return, engulfed in the sea.
					
					 Later, the villagers began to call the two pillar-shaped rocks by the sea "Pubu Rocks" in memory of the couple.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de personalidad de organizacion internacional
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de personalidad de organizacion internacional
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el dia 16 el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea con sede en Espana, Alejandro Cao de Benos.
					La misiva senala que este ano la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea organizo la reunion internacional con el tema de "La gloria de haber nombrado a nuestro gran Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea".
					
					Apunta que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il formo el EPC como el ejercito mas fuerte sin precedente en la historia.
					
					Asevera que el Dirigente, con destacada perspicacia militar, aclaro que la soberania y la dignidad del pais se defienden solo con las fuerzas armadas y realizo con firmeza la politica de Songun, aun en medio del periodo mas penoso. 
					
					Agrega que los delegados de todas partes del mundo recuerdan con emocion de la vida gloriosa y las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il y de que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un lleva adelante la causa de la construccion socialista mediante la "velocidad Masikryong".
					
					Sigue que el mundo admira a la patria del Juche como bastion de la bandera roja, esperanza de los pueblos oprimidos y defensor de la humanidad moral y noble.
					
					Subraya que la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea impulsara con vigor la labor para defender a vuestro pais haciendo frente a las calumnias de los medios occidentales y las maniobras y la conspiracion de los imperialistas y realizara mas el intercambio en las esferas cultural, diplomatica,  deportiva, cientifica y economica.
					
					Apunta que estan convencidos de que bajo la direccion del Mariscal, la RPDC se convertira en un pais poderoso y unido que tenga amigos intimos en muchas ciudades y aldeas del mundo.
					
					Le desea de todo corazon buena salud y solo victoria.
					
					Acota que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il estan siempre en nosotros.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC acusa a EE.UU. de bloquear conversaciones a seis bandas
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC acusa a EE.UU. de bloquear conversaciones a seis bandas
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que recientemente el delegado especial de la politica sobre Corea del Departamento de Estado norteamericano realizo su giro por los paises vecinos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 26 la siguiente respuesta a la pregunta de la ACNC:
					Las palabras y acciones hechas por el delegado especial norteamericano comprobaron que no se ha cambiado el proceder de EE.UU. que obstaculiza la reanudacion de conversaciones a seis bandas insistiendo en las injustas premisas.
					
					A traves de eso, se ha hecho mas claro que EE.UU. no tiene ningun interes en la reanudacion de las conversaciones a seis bandas.
					
					Las conversaciones a seis bandas toman por objetivo eliminar el origen del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y realizar la desnuclearizacion de toda esta region adhiriendose al espiritu de respeto a la soberania e igualdad.
					
					Sin embargo, en el pasado EE.UU. no ejecuto ni uno de sus articulos obligatorios prometidos en las conversaciones a 6 bandas y ahora niega sostener el dialogo presentando la demanda bandidesca, segun la cual la RPDC debe ceder, ante todo, unilateralmente.
					
					Para evadir las crecientes censuras y presiones internas y externas, EE.UU. practica la astucia para imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de que no se reanudan las conversaciones a 6 bandas.
					
					Aunque se valga de todas las artimanas, EE.UU. no se liberara de la responsabilidad raigal que engendro el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y la otra de preparar el ambiente a favor de desnuclearizacion al abolir su politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					La RPDC desea la solucion del problema mediante el dialogo y negociaciones, pero no tolerara jamas la injusta premisa de EE.UU.
					
					Se quedara siempre tal como es la actitud injusta de EE.UU. que crea los obstaculos artificiales en la reanudacion de dialogo presentando la premisa, y este pais gringo se responsabilizara enteramente de todas consecuencias que se emanen de ello.
					
					La RPDC tiene la invariable meta de lograr la desnuclearizacion de toda la Peninsula Coreana, pero no puede menos de intensificar sin parar las fuerzas disuasivas mientras que se tornan cada dia mas abiertas las maniobras hostiles de EE.UU. y se agranda la amenaza nuclear.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun aboga por desarrollar ciencia y tecnica de pais
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun aboga por desarrollar ciencia y tecnica de pais
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual de hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que la ciencia y tecnica son lo mas fundamental en el desarrollo de un Estado, y prosigue:
					El poderio ideo-politico y militar del pais se pondra de pleno manifiesto solo cuando este garantizado por la ciencia y tecnica de punta.
					
					La ciencia y la tecnica son el cimiento del poderio estatal y la fuerza motriz para la prosperidad nacional.
					
					Desarrollarlas vertiginosamente deviene una garantia importante para poner todos los dominios del pais en la firme base cientifica conveniente a la fisonomia de un Estado prospero.
					
					Ademas sirve de una demanda importante para tomar siempre la iniciativa en la confrontacion con los imperialistas y ostentar solamente las victorias.
					
					Para aislar y asfixiar a la RPDC, los imperialistas intensifican la presion politica, la amenaza militar y la demagogia psicologica, mientras practican la politica de bloqueo cientifico-tecnico y las sanciones.
					
					El desarrollo rapido de la ciencia y tecnica es la fuerza motriz que posibilita lograr cambios decisivos en la construccion de la potencia economica y la mejora de vida del pueblo levantando en alto la llamarada de creacion de "velocidad Masikryong".
					
					En la ciencia y la tecnica, hay la llave de creacion, innovacion y gran salto. Lo comprueban las experiencias de los uniformados quienes registran una velocidad de construccion asombrante a todo el mundo con las llamas de creacion de "velocidad Masikryong".
					
					No hay futuro sin la ciencia y es imposible lograr la prosperidad del pais y nacion sin desarrollar la ciencia y la tecnica.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia campana de DDHH anti-RPDC del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia campana de DDHH anti-RPDC del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los titeres surcoreanos presentaron ante la ONU junto con las fuerzas extranjeras el "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y se enfrascaron en aprobarlo. 
					Y cuando fue "aprobado" este documento, le dan "bienvenida" e insisten en aprobar la "ley de DDHH del Norte de Corea" en la "Asamblea Nacional". 
					
					Esto es un grave desafio a la dignidad y soberania de la RPDC y una artimana grosera para intensificar la campana internacional anti-RPDC. 
					
					Critica asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y continua: 
					
					La campana intrigante de DDHH anti-RPDC, desarrollada por los titeres surcoreanos en confabulacion con Estados Unidos, no pasa de ser una artimana ridicula para ocultar el verdadero aspecto del Sur de Corea convertido en la colonia de EE.UU. y peor infierno de democracia y de derechos humanos, eliminar la crisis de dominacion causada por las politicas antipopulares y desviar el descontento de la opinion publica. 
					
					Antes de censurar atrevidamente a alguien, los titeres surcoreanos deben reflexionarse de sus crimenes de haber resucitado la dictadura de "Yusin" y exterminado la democracia y los derechos humanos. 
					
					La campana de DDHH anti-RPDC, siendo producto de malsano intento de derrocar el regimen norcoreano y lograr la ambicion de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes", traeran solo la desconfianza entre ambas partes coreanas, la agravacion de confrontacion y la guerra. 
					
					Pues, este alboroto es una grave provocacion equivalente a los ejercicios militares conjuntos anti-RPDC y lleva al umbral de guerra las relaciones intercoreanas tan criticas. He aqui la gravedad de la campana de DDHH anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia acto traidor de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia acto traidor de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos invitaron al enviado especial encargado de "DDHH del Norte de Corea" del Departamento de Estado norteamericano y otros politiqueros extranjeros para mendigarles la cooperacion en el "problema nuclear" y "DDHH" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					El periodico Minju Joson, en un comentario individual de este martes, lo califica de proceder miserable de los vendepatrias y serviles a grandes potencias, y continua: 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no tienen la calificacion de hablar de la "renuncia nuclear" de la RPDC. 
					
					La RPDC preparo el disuasivo nuclear porque EE.UU. emplazo en el suelo surcoreano enorme cantidad de armas nucleares y amenazo junto con los titeres surcoreanos con armas nucleares a la RPDC. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos solicitaron a otros paises la cooperacion anti-RPDC cuestionando el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC que defiende fidedignamente la paz del pais y la vida de la nacion, sin hablar nada del aumento del peligro de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana por parte de EE.UU. 
					
					De esta manera, demostraron la naturaleza vendepatria y servil a grandes potencias de si mismos que buscan la salida en la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras y en la confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos tampoco deben hablar de "DDHH", porque ellos convirtieron el suelo surcoreano en el infierno humano donde predomina la dictadura fascista y se pisotea el derecho a la vida de la poblacion.
					
					Piden a las fuerzas extranjeras la cooperacion anti-RPDC insistiendo en la "renuncia nuclear" y "estado de DDHH" de la RPDC con el malsano objetivo de desarmarla, preparar el pretexto de intervencion en asuntos internos y lograr la ambicion de agresion contra ella. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos recurren a la cooperacion con las fuerzas extranjeras contra su connacional RPDC para salvar la crisis de dominacion causada por sus politicas antipopulares y la politica conflictiva, lo que adelantara  mas su autodestruccion.
